note: The Metropolitan module can be connected with the Seoul module or used as a standalone starting point. Nami Island is at its best in spring (cherry blossoms) and autumn (fall foliage), while the Garden of Morning Calm's winter lighting festival is a popular attraction in winter. Korean Folk Village also offers evening opening hours (Fri~Sun, April~November). Especially recommended for families, Everland fans, and nature lovers.
